fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Attack a player each night. This does not rampage (for some reason.)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- you will passively attack anyone that visits you.
- RB, control, and direct redirect immune.
- You will automatically attack jailor-type roles when jailed
- you can't be hanged (your neck is too thick)
- you lose if all other players are of the same faction
